reviewText: I saw Uriah Heep back in 1974 in Pittsburgh, Pa. I still love them to this day.  This is a great DVD!  Even though David Byron is not with them anymore the new singer is almost as good as him.  Great sound and picture. If you are a Uriah Heep fan then you will love this.  I wish they would put this on blue ray.
A great DVD with a terrific selection of songs, done superbly.
The Heep was among the first live concerts I saw as a youth and this anthology brings back fond memories of the great concert experiences of that time in my life.
Has a lot of good songs by Uriah Heep.  I wish it would have had the David Byron years
it was alright but nothing beats the original band good picture sound was great f u like this band go get it.
